title: Lot Of 3 T206 W/2 HOF'ers All SGC Graded 128.00 Delivered
author: Moonlight Graham

posts.post_title: Lot Of 3 T206 W/2 HOF'ers All SGC Graded 128.00 Delivered
posts.post_content:
This is a collector's lot for sure. The cards display well for the grade and all are in brand new fresh SGC slabs. Just think of the fun you can have recreating one of the greatest pitching matchups ever with the Walsh and Joss cards!! Paypal any way/check/mo. Thank you for having a look. The last 3 are 128.00 delivered!!
Joss 75.00
Walsh SOLD
Collins 45.00
Donovan 30.00
Baker SOLD
Clarke SOLD


Joe
